modName: Patch for An NPO Module Crossbows
summary: Simply a few needed fixes to the NPO Crossbows mod
descriptionHtml:
I love the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43517/?]An NPO Module Crossbows[/url] mod and was making a sorting mod that included it

While I was in there I noticed a handfull of bugs that I fixed real quick.

[list][*]Dwarven and Steel bolts had the wrong values.
[/*][*]Nordic items needed the keyword to show in the Nordic section of the crafting menu.
[/*][*]CCOR and WAF additions were needed (You don't need them but the support is in there if you have them)
[/*][/list]
You need the original mod this just replaces the .esp
